org.aoplib4j.gof.observer.internal
Class ObserverAspect

java.lang.Object
  org.aoplib4j.gof.observer.internal.ObserverAspect

public final class ObserverAspect
extends java.lang.Object

The AspectJ aspect implementing the Observer pattern.

Author:
Adrian Citu

Field Summary
private  GofObserver observer
          the classes annotated with the Observer annotation will automatically implement the GofObserver interface.
private  GofSubject subject
          the classes annotated with the Subject annotation will automatically implement the GofSubject interface and the implementation will be GofSubjectImpl.

Method Detail

addObserverPointcut

public void addObserverPointcut(GofSubject sbj,
                                GofObserver obs)
AspectJ pointcut represented by the call of a method annotated with RegisterObserver and having as unique parameter a class annotated with the Observer annotation. 
 AspectJ pointcut:
 execution(@org.aoplib4j.gof.observer
  .RegisterObserver * * (..))
  && this(sbj) && args(obs)

Parameters:
sbj - the instance of GofObserver on which the annotated method is called.
obs - the instance of GofObserver that is the parameter passed to the annotated method.

addObserverAdvice

public void addObserverAdvice(GofSubject sbj,
                              GofObserver obs)
AspectJ advice for the pointcut addObserverPointcut(GofSubject, GofObserver). The advice will add the obs object as a observer of the sbj object calling GofSubject.addObserver(GofObserver).

Parameters:
sbj - instance of GofSubject.
obs - instance of GofObserver.

notifyObserversPointcut

public void notifyObserversPointcut(GofSubject sbj)
Pointcut representing the execution of the method annotated with the NotifyObservers annotation. 
 AspectJ pointcut:
 execution(@org.aoplib4j.gof.observer
  .NotifyObservers * * (..))
 && this(sbj)

Parameters:
sbj - instance of GofSubject

notifyObserverAdvice

public void notifyObserverAdvice(GofSubject sbj,
                                 org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint thisJoinPoint)
                          throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                 java.lang.IllegalAccessException
Advice for the pointcut notifyObserversPointcut(GofSubject). For every GofObserver the advice will instantiate a class extending ObserverCallback and call the method ObserverCallback.notifyObserver(NotifyInformation). The class name extending the ObserverCallback is retrieved by Observer.callbackClass().

Parameters:
sbj - instance of GofSubject.
thisJoinPoint - AspectJ JoinPoint.
Throws:
java.lang.InstantiationException - thrown when creating the ObserverCallback instance by introspection.
java.lang.IllegalAccessException - thrown when creating the ObserverCallback instance by introspection.

unregisterObserversPointcut

public void unregisterObserversPointcut(GofSubject sbj)
Pointcut representing the execution of the method annotated with the UnregisterObservers annotation.

Parameters:
sbj - instance of GofSubject

unregisterObserversAdvice

public void unregisterObserversAdvice(GofSubject sbj)
Advice for the pointcut unregisterObserversPointcut(GofSubject). All the observers attached to the sbj will be removed.

Parameters:
sbj - instance of GofSubject.

cresteInstanceofNotifyInformation

private NotifyInformation cresteInstanceofNotifyInformation(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint jp,
                                                            GofObserver obs)
Parameters:
jp - AspectJ join point.
obs - instance of the observer.
Returns:
a new instance of NotifyInformation.
